meanings.definition: Providing or experiencing warmth and comfort in a close, cozy manner.
meanings.sent1: The soft blanket made the bed feel snugglier.
meanings.sent2: The new sofa looked snugglier than the old one.
meanings.sent3: The puppy found a snugglier spot to nap in the sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: The fireplace made the room feel even snugglier on a cold night.
meanings.sent5: The warm cup of cocoa was the snugglier choice on a rainy day.

meanings.sent1: Her sweater was snugglier than mine on the chilly evening.
meanings.sent2: The cabin in the woods was snugglier than expected.
meanings.sent3: The oversized pillow made the chair look even snugglier.
meanings.sent4: The fluffy socks felt snugglier than walking barefoot.
meanings.sent5: The thick blanket was the snugglier option for the movie night.
